mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM t_sys_menu m LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_menu rm ON m.MENU_ID = rm.MENU_ID LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_user ur ON rm.ROLE_ID = ur.ROLE_ID WHERE ur.USER_ID = #{userId} AND m.HIDDEN = 0 ORDER BY m.PARENT_ID, m.MENU_ID
SELECT m.* FROM t_sys_menu m WHERE m.HIDDEN = 0 ORDER BY m.PARENT_ID, m.MENU_ID
